Came across this gem on twitter last week:

Raymond Chandler owning all science fiction writers and casually inventing Google in a letter from 1953 pic.twitter.com/NHk5Oxy8nd

— Andy Cush (@cushac) September 1, 2016

I just finished reading Ready Player One and this is similar to how I felt in some parts of the book. The book is laden with 80s pop culture references; most of which I’ve never heard of before. Not that I didn’t like the book as a whole, but y’know.
